hero.subtitle: Holistic Health Learning Platform
hero.description: Free online course platform based on psychology to help you gain knowledge about psychology health, mental health, and balanced nutrition for a healthier lifestyle.

eraOfChange.title: Era of Change
eraOfChange.description: The era that has changed and become more advanced greatly affects human life, including their lifestyle patterns. HEAL Student was founded with the goal of better preparing website users and future generations with the healthy lifestyle skills needed.

currentSituation.title: Current Situation
currentSituation.description: Currently, many people still make mistakes in managing their eating patterns, which impacts obesity, psychological conditions, and mental health. The ease of ordering fast food that doesn't comply with balanced nutrition is one of the main backgrounds of this problem.
currentSituation.statText: Obesity rates are predicted to increase from 14% to 24% by 2035.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.quote: Maintaining psychological health, mental health, and balanced nutrition
ourMission.description: Our mission is to provide a free online course platform to help users gain knowledge about psychological health, mental health, and balanced nutrition, so it affects a healthy lifestyle pattern.

joinUs.title: Need Help or Want to Discuss?
joinUs.description: We provide mentors so participants can join weekly Zoom meetings to ask questions or need help regarding problems related to psychological health, mental health, and balanced nutrition.
